com.stabilit.sc.listener
Class ConnectionListenerSupport

java.lang.Object
  com.stabilit.sc.listener.ListenerSupport<IConnectionListener>
      com.stabilit.sc.listener.ConnectionListenerSupport

public final class ConnectionListenerSupport
extends ListenerSupport<IConnectionListener>

The Class ConnectionListenerSupport. Allows logging on connection level - fire read/write, connect/disconnect.
